room_title: Escape room "The Mausoleum" by Escape Rhode Island in Providence
room_description: A dark cloud hangs low over Swan Point Cemetery, and rumors grow of strange occurrences all over the city. Mysterious figures lurk around every corner, as the 50th anniversary of H.P. Lovecraft's death approaches. You all awake from a horrible dream, on the grass outside the Lovecraft mausoleum... and know something has to be done.
